document.full_text: president barack obama said on saturday curbing foreign oil dependence and investments in clean fuel technology are the main tenets of his plan to meet long-term energy needs and in turn strengthen the domestic economy.
document.title: obama pushes for oil use reduction, clean fuel technology
lines_and_colors: president barack obama said on saturday curbing foreign oil dependence and investments in clean fuel technology are the main tenets of his plan to meet long-term energy needs and in turn strengthen the domestic economy.
